apps.name: Quack Attack
apps.description: Quack Attack is a fun casual Duck Hunting game!

apps.name: Hungry Caterpillar
apps.description: Classic snake game updated - play on phone or tablet using one tap controls, or fire tv using a remote or game controller!

apps.name: Tappy Run
apps.description: Fun infinite running game with blocky voxel graphics and one tap controls!

apps.name: 4 Games 1 Screen
apps.description: Play four different games, all at the same time... 4 Games 1 Screen is the ultimate brain training challenge!

apps.name: Super Jump
apps.description: Super Jump is a super fun infinite platform jumping game!

apps.name: Jewel Match
apps.description: Jewel Match is a challenging and addictive jewel matching puzzle game!

apps.name: Fruit Run Slot Machine
apps.description: Like slot machines, fruit machines, and one armed bandits? Play this game!

apps.name: Little Fish
apps.description: Little Fish is a fun game for all ages - eat the smaller fish and avoid being eaten by the bigger fish!

apps.name: Racing Game
apps.description: Simple casual racing game. Tilt to steer, avoid going off road, finish in the best time possible!

apps.name: Street Race Swipe
apps.description: Street Race Swipe is a fun simple casual racing game!

apps.name: Zombie Survival
apps.description: Touch the screen to guide your character away from the chasing zombies!

apps.name: Count 1 to 10
apps.description: Learn to count from 1 to 10 in English, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Chinese, Spanish, and Welsh

apps.name: Game Services Tutorial
apps.description: Companion app to the google play game services tutorial. Source on github, tutorial on blog.

apps.name: 3D Game Engine
apps.description: A basic 3D game engine built using LibGdx. Source on github.

apps.name: Sensory
apps.description: Multitouch cause and effect app (for people with special needs and young children). Source on github.

apps.name: Sensory Live Wallpaper
apps.description: Colourful starburst particle effects on your home screen. Source on github.
